select rm, buy_ticket_seq, ticket_category_seq, ticket_name, ticket_remain, ticket_refund_flag,in_user_id, member_name, to_char(in_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as in_date from ( select rownum as rm, buy_ticket_seq, ticket_category_seq, ticket_name, ticket_remain, ticket_refund_flag,in_user_id, member_name,in_date from ( select a.buy_ticket_seq, a.ticket_category_seq, c.ticket_name, a.ticket_remain, a.ticket_refund_flag, a.in_user_id, b.member_name, a.in_date from buy_ticket a left join member b on (a.in_user_id = b.member_id) left join ticket_category c on (a.ticket_category_seq = c.ticket_category_seq) where 1=1
and ticket_refund_flag = 'N'
and ticket_refund_flag = 'Y'
and to_char(a.in_date, 'YYYYMMDD') = #{selDate}
and a.in_user_id like '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
and b.member_name like '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
and (b.member_name like '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%' or a.in_user_id like '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%' )
) ) where rm between #{rowStart} and #{rowEnd} order by in_date desc
